articles.title: Eddie Jones ‘not concerned at all’ by England defeat to Argentina as he urges players to embrace pressure
articles.description: Eddie Jones has told England to relish coming “under the pump” in the wake of Sunday’s chastening 30-29 Autumn Nations Series defeat by Argentina at Twickenham.

articles.title: Argentina stun England with 30-29 win at Twickenham
articles.description: England made a disastrous start to the autumn after Emiliano Boffelli inspired Argentina to only their second ever victory at Twickenham with a 30-29 win.
articles.content:

articles.content:
England suffered a shock defeat on Sunday as Argentina claimed a famous 30-29 victory at Twickenham.
The South American side got just their second ever win at Twickenham, and their first since 2006.
